Description.Text: Palais Namaskar is a luxury 5-star superior property offering elegant accommodation in northeast Marrakech. Highlights include a luxury spa, gourmet French restaurant and a rooftop bar. Palmeraie is a quiet suburban area populated with luxury hotels and boasting plenty of green space. Regional places of interest include Palmeraie Golf Palace, the Atlas Mountains and Djebilet Hills. The property is housed in a collection of grand Moroccan style low-rise buildings set amongst 50,000sqm of scented and manicured Balinese-inspired gardens complemented by cascading waterfalls and lakes. Facilities include a luxury spa with outdoor baths, Jacuzzis and swimming pools, hammams, a gym and beautifully appointed treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Deluxe rooms are 44sqm and decorated in a modern style with Moroccan influences, warm earth tones and a fireplace. They feature a separate dressing area and a terrace with a Jacuzzi set in a tranquil pool. Amenities include a Bang & Olufsen flat-screen satellite/cable TV with integrated DVD player, iPod dock, Nespresso coffee machine and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and separate large walk-in shower. Le Namaskar restaurant offers gourmet French cuisine. Espace T offers sumptuous deserts, tea and coffee in an elegant lounge with an outside terrace. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish rooftop No mad bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
